document_data.name: Rhen
document_data.mainbody: '''Rhen''' was one of the bandits under the [[Iron Fox]] in the mid–8{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Possessions: The men of the Iron Fox wore light armor and brought no lances or horses.
document_data.History: When [[Elminster Aumar]], a [[Chosen of Mystra]], carried out a scouring of the bandits in [[Buckralam's Starn]], Rhen remained with his boss, the Iron Fox, until moments before his death at [[Fox Tower]]. They were ambushed at the mess hall, where Elminster struck him down with a [[crossbow]] quarrel to the face.
